tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    closure_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    reason TEXT,
    detour_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE detours (
    detour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detour_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
    closure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    closure_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE detours (
    detour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detour_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_location VARCHAR(100),
    end_location VARCHAR(100),
    distance_km DECIMAL(10,2),
    duration_hours DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_point VARCHAR(100),
    end_point VARCHAR(100),
    road_closure_id INT,
    detour_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE road_closures (
  closure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR(255),
  closure_start_date DATE,
  closure_end_date DATE,
  closure_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE detours (
  detour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  detour_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  detour_distance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE route_planning (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_id INT,
  detour_id INT,
  planning_date DATE,
  planning_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(255),
  agency_location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE detours (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_closure_id INT,
    detour_road_name VARCHAR(255),
    detour_start TIMESTAMP,
    detour_end TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE planned_routes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detour_id INT,
    route_name VARCHAR(255),
    route_start TIMESTAMP,
    route_end TIMESTAMP
);
